articles.description: Author Geetanjali Shree and translator Daisy Rockwell share the £50,000 prize for ‘extraordinarily funny and fun’ Tomb of Sand
articles.content: Geetanjali Shrees extremely exuberant and incredibly playful Tomb of Sand, translated from Hindi by Daisy Rockwell, has won the International Booker prize, becoming the first novel translated from Hi… [+3996 chars]
